text: Long-dead destriers, awakened to serve their Unliving masters far beyond death.
The pride of Nehekharan armies, impacting enemy lines with bone-shattering force and grinding the corpses beneath their heavy wheels.
Ulthuan's Great Eagles are the firm allies of the Elves, fighting their causes since the coming of Chaos.
The eldest, most powerful Dragons can destroy entire units with a molten blast of their white-hot breath.
Hailing from deep within the forests of the Old World, this dragon breathes deadly, poisonous fumes instead of fire.
True horses no longer, Dark Magic corrupts the finest Elven steeds and turns them into black-flanked killers.
Secretly nurtured by Malekith, Black Dragons are enchanted with Dark Magic that corrupts and enhances.
The corrupted Dark Pegasi fly south from the Chaos Wastes to Naggaroth's Iron Mountains to make their nests.
Marauder mobs are awarded even greater mobility when riding their crude chariots of bone and wood, lashed together with the guts and sinew of the vanquished.
It is to the Plain of Bones that a Vampire Lord travels to claim a Zombie Dragon as their mount.
When the souls are released they endeavour not to return without new victims to torment for eternity.
The dread steeds of Chaos are more than mere horses, but creatures tainted by Daemon blood, said to be gifts from the Dark Gods themselves.
The bond between rider and steed goes beyond friendship or family; they act as one.
Its forehead adorned with a spiral horn, this noble mount carries the Spellweaver where her magical gifts are needed most.
Fly on your wings, like an eagle. Touch the sun. Track the foe, ambush, and defeat.
The bond between rider and steed goes beyond friendship or family; they act as one.
Fly on your wings, like an eagle. Touch the sun. Track the foe, ambush, and defeat.
Its forehead adorned with a spiral horn, this noble mount carries the Spellsinger where her magical gifts are needed most.
